articles.title: Twitter brings its new quote tweet view to Android and the web - The Verge
articles.description: Twitter has made it easier to see quote tweets on Android and the web. The company rolled out similar functionality to iOS on May 12th. You’ll be able to see a list of retweets with comments and a list of people who just retweeted a tweet.

articles.title: Eighth Amazon warehouse worker dies from COVID-19 - NBC News
articles.description: Another Amazon warehouse worker has died from COVID-19, bringing the total known deaths to eight employees, the company said Thursday.

articles.title: Civilization VI is free on the Epic Games Store - PCWorld
articles.description: You won't get the full experience unless you buy the expansions, but Civilization VI is perfectly enjoyable for thousands of hours on its own—and it's free until next Thursday.
